abstractText: Various types of electronic equipment are used during spawning ground and carcass surveys. It is essential for surveyors to be familiar with the operation of this equipment and that adequate maintenance and care is followed to ensure proper functionality. The following instructions document the use of a coded wire tag (CWT) T-wand and blue wand and the proper technique to scan an adult salmonid carcass for a CWT tag.
title: Spawning Ground Carcass Coded Wire Tag (CWT) Scanning v1.0
